title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Examples of appropriate labels for the force due to gravity include: F G , F g , F grav , W , mg , Mg , “grav force,” “F Earth on cart,” “F on cart by Earth,” F Earth on cart , F E,Cart , F Cart,E . The labels G or g are not appropriate labels for the force due to gravity. F n , F N , N , “normal force,” “ground force,” or similar labels may be used for the normal force.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.

The response accurately includes three of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.
